curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rancher/k3os/master/install.sh > install.sh
chmod a+x install.sh 
./install.sh --takeover --debug --no-format --config config.yaml /dev/sda1 https://github.com/rancher/k3os/releases/download/v0.20.7-k3s1r0/k3os-amd64.iso

needs a config.yaml - see https://github.com/rancher/k3os#configuration-reference
SSH key is for "rancher" user - there's no root account - hcloud server ssh -u rancher <servername> to log in

ssh_authorized_keys:
- ssh-rsa ssh-rsa 
k3os:
  data_sources:
  - hetzner
  ntp_servers:
  - 0.us.pool.ntp.org
  - 1.us.pool.ntp.org
  k3s_args:
  - server
